name: (I spy with...) My little Eye - ice cream special!
name_original: (I spy with...) My little Eye - ice cream special!
description:
Objective:

An "I spy" game! 

Click on the Hint button on the top right hand corner and find 3 items and continue to the next level.

Controls:

Left mouse click

R key - restart

Alt+Enter - Fullscreen

From the developer:

Sorry for the bugs as the game is still in the initial stage and this is the first time I am creating such a game! Have sent a ticket to GMS2 for assistance and hopefully will be able to fix the issues in a few weeks. - 19 Sep 2021

 There are 3 levels in ver 0.2. Hint will fade out slowly, just wait for it to be destroyed. - 19 Sep 2021

Thanks for playing! Do let me know what you like or didn't like about it in the comments!
